about_the_game:
The Supporter Pack is a bundle of extra goodies, aimed to those who already own the game, but would like to further support the developers nonetheless. The short story collection and the digital art book are also both perfect for digging deeper into the lore of King Arthur: Knight's Tale.

This new DLC for King Arthur: Knight's Tale includes:

Short Story Collection: A 170-page, digital short story collection "Chronicles of Avalon" with 9 exciting short stories (including a prologue to the Storm and an epilogue that connects the stories with the game) by acclaimed Hungarian fantasy authors - Balázs Farkas, Gábor Izsóf, Viktor Juhász, Ágnes Körmendi, Csilla Kleinheincz, Áron Németh, Bogi Takács and László Tamásfi. Illustrated by Anikó Salamon and László Vida.

Digital Art Book: A massive, 220-page Art Book - a PDF including concept art, cinematic stills, portraits, backgrounds and early sketches, as well as a short "Legacy" section, art from our older King Arthur games.

Digital World Map: A detailed digital map of Avalon.

HD Wallpapers

The above listed items are not affecting gameplay in any way whatsoever.

Thank you for your support!
